movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: If I could go back in time, I would stop the production of this movie at all costs!!!!
review_detailed_main: This movie was a complete disgrace!!! I would give this movie a 0 but that is not a number in the scale!!!! How could they ruin such a classic!!! I really don't understand how people could take one of the greatest movies of all time and put it to shame. FIrst of all, if you watch Dumb and Dumber, the amazing original, you would realize Lloyd and Harry have known each other since elementary school, NOT high school. And what the **** was up with Lloyd's father being a Spanish janitor?????? I was So confused! This "movie" (if it can even be called a movie) had a horrible plot, horrible acting, and it was just down right not funny. I was actually sobbing to see such a classic movie like Dumb and Dumber being demolished into oblivion! This movie is not even worth watching for free!!!! This movie is a complete waste of time!!! DO NOT WATCH THIS MOVIE!!! Trust me on movies!!! i am a huge fan of movies and i know what i am talking about when i criticize movies!!! If you read my other comments after watching the movies i commented, you will agree!!! Do Not Watch This Movie!!!

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
It really was as bad as I predicted... Unfunny and devoid of the whackyness the first movie was endowed with through rubber-face Jim Carreys antics.

I stopped watching some time into the movie. (never bothered to check how long it kept me watching) This turkey (and it's a big one) really deserves its place in the bottom 100 movie list. And I hope it stays there too.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: This movie is just dumb. I mean the actors themselves are actually quite good, but the story line development is lame. Character development direction is virtually non-existent. The lines are poorly crafted that even people with the most juvenile sense of humor will cringe in pain as each line is delivered. I forced myself through the whole film to ensure I was not judging a book by its cover, but with the exception of a few rare moments this movie is surely one that you will want to forget. This a movie should have been left on the shelf. Don't feel like you've missed anything if you haven't seen this one.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: I loved Dumb and Dumber with a passion. All of my jokes came from that movie and I still say them even today. So when I saw the trailer in the theatres with Harry and Lloyd just laughing, before they said what movie it was I was jumping up and down in my seat I already knew! So I was excited the whole summer, then saw the movie, and it just stunk. If you want to watch this movie because of the original, forget it...it's not worth it. I will give the new movie another shot and see if it's still as bad or not, but I expect it will still suck. There were some funny parts, the bus was great. Bob saget and the American Pie dad were cool too. The guys who played Harry and Lloyd did a good job with their characters, but the movie just wasn't good and not all that funny

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
Hard to believe this movie fell out of the worst 100. It is by far one of the worst 5 movies I have ever seen. I might argue it is the worst. I didn't make it past 45 minutes. Other movies are equally as bad but at least I made it thru them...this one I could not. IMDb has a problem too many juveniles stuffing the boxes for movies they have not seen. THis movie was in the bottom 100 not that long ago. Believe me it belongs there.

So IMDb says I need to write at least 10 line for this review to count. Why was this movie ever made? It was made years after the original and none of the original actors appear here. Totally pointless and all I can say is I am proud I never saw it in the theater or spent a sent to watch it.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: All the negative reviews of this movie are from small minded boring people who obviously don't understand the humor in the film lol The movie is definitely stupid/goofy type humor but is funny if you have a good sense of humor & are able to understand jokes that normally go over peoples heads.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: Having read the reviews prior to seeing this movie I was expecting the worst. There are quite a few bad reviews. I was pleasantly surprised though. I watched it with my 10 year old kid and we both laughed heartily at a lot of the scenes. It was exactly as the title implies DUMB, which is what made it so funny. It was stupid, good stupid. If you don't compare to it to the original it stands on it's on own as a decent film. The pranks and jokes are quick and well... funny. I know there a lot of people who really hated this film and generally I agree with the majority on when a film is not good. This time I must disagree. It was very entertaining. Watch it with a kid and you'll enjoy it even more. Oh one thing in closing, Bob Saget did get a little annoying with the S word one too many times. It was funny the first 5 times but lost it.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
i couldn't get through the first 20 minutes of it. Its forced comedy with poor punchlines that becomes pure torture to a persons mind. This should have been rated the Worst movie of all time, bar none (including Gigli)!

Perhaps if they starred the original cast, maybe it would have brought justice to the whole prequel idea. These two wannabes just try TOO hard to be in their predecessors shoes. But they don't fit in at all.

Again, i repeat, AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

Good thing i didn't waste much of my time watching this movie neither did i waste my money on it. I'd rather be listening to David Letterman's cheesy musicals than bear another minute of this crap of a movie.

WM

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: "This is the suckiest bunch of sucks that ever sucked."
review_detailed_main: If you liked "Dumb & Dumber," then you will HATE THIS MOVIE!!! It is horrible!!! I cannot stress this fact enough. I have to admit that I giggled a few times, but the script was bad, the characters were bad, and the story line was so bad that at one point I couldn't figure out if there was even a plot. They try to do some "Dumb & Dumber" call-backs with a few lines, but it all failed. Don't waste your time, your money, or your disk space for this sad excuse for a comedy.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
Let's face it, if you went into a restaurant and ordered a sh*t sandwich and got precisely that, could you honestly complain about what you got?

Dumb and Dumberer is precisely that. The title sums it up and you really shouldn't expect anything other than rubbish when you sit down to watch it.

That said, I am surprised to see it in the bottom 100 of IMDb's lists. It is bad, but I'm sure there are many films far above it that deserve its place at the bottom much, much more.

Dumb and Dumberer could never hope to compete with its predecessor but its no worse really than any other teen-comedy-high-school nonsense. If the original movie had not been made, then this one wouldn't have gotten anywhere near the bad press it has. But, alas, it was not to be, and so this film will slip into obscurity like many ill-conceived sequels, destined to be forgotten, or talked about with ill-disguised scorn when reminiscing over the original movie.

The best way to watch this film (if you have to at all) is to try and forget the characters Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels made their own, and view it as if that first film had never happened. Also, console yourself whilst watching that there are a few bloopers tacked onto the end that are the comedic highlight of this unfunny movie, although its really not worth watching the film just for them. You might then get some enjoyment out of an otherwise bland film.

In summary then, its bad but not really deserving a place in the worst 100 of IMDb.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
This has to be one of the worst comedies i have ever seen. Not only were the jokes unfunny, but the movie was so boring. When I saw that none of the Farrely brothers had directed this, i knew i was in for a disaster, and i was right.

The first and best "Dumb and Dumber" got me laughing so hard i pooped a little. Now this movie so good because the acting, the directing, and improvisation. This remains to be the best comedy i have ever seen, next to "Theres something about Mary" I officially hate "Dumb and Dumberer" They should never have remade it, and this director should be shot.

Thankyou for reading this.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Not a sequel but still has its moments
review_detailed_main:
I don't really disagree with the bad comments except that I don't think it was as bad as people are stating.

The original is obviously a different movie because it was original, and even undertaking this movie was a difficult task.

Also, they tried to use jokes from the original to tie it in I guess ("i like it a LOTT") but not even one of them worked.

The things I did like were the original jokes with the other characters. I did laugh at the mascot guy, and some of the interactions between the characters were original.

But again, my expectations were very, very low when I watched it and I also watched it at 4 AM so I might be biased.

But I know a horribly unoriginal movie when I see one and they definitely tried to add an original flair to this, which is funny at times.

I would say it's about 25% as engaging as the original.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Weak follow up to the 1994 hit
review_detailed_main:
A poor dialogue in this prequel.The actors did a good job imitating Jim Carey and Jeff Daniels, but the story itself is really bad.Some laughs but for a limited time. At least the first one had a funny story. I think they shouldn't have done a second movie who ruined the image of the first one.

I saw this movie in july 2003 but i had the chance to see it again in 2006 on TV and it was worse from watching it in a movie theater.At least in a theater you cant sleep. I really felt like sleeping because its not enjoyable at all. I gave this a 3 just not to destroy the actors future...Good luck

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
It doesn't happen a lot that a movie is really awful, but this is everything! It just isn't funny! The physical comedy is totally ridiculous! How hard Eric Christian Olsen and Derek Richardson try, there getting more embarrassing every minute. There is no way they can replace unthankfully replaced Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels. The harder they try, the worse it gets. Also the story is nothing. Even a children's movie has got a more intelligent story line than this film. Dumb and Dumber are such a great characters. As well as in the previous real movie as in the cartoon. Unfortunately, they really don't take advantage of it, because the movie is even dumber than the characters.

So only watch this movie if you are really (and I mean REALLY) bored! Else: don't even bother to think about it! That's why I rate is 1/10.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: Whoever made this movie is a degenerative member of society. To take an amazing concept and destroy it must be an appealing task for the "idealists" that created this abomination of a sequel, but I was more disappointed with this movie than any other that I have seen. The reason for this is that I felt that "Dumb and Dumber", the original, was the absolute hands-down funniest movie I have EVER seen in my life. This movie, however, I would rank along with something like "The Hot Chick"... It's a movie that tried to be funny, but fell too far into the commercial grasp. Additionally, I was surprised as to how many recycled jokes were attempted... and failed miserably. This movie is terrible.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: I dk why so many bad reviewS?? I usually do not do reviews but after seeing the rating i feel like i want to give this movie props. It is one of the funnier movies ive ever seen. It Definetley top 50 all time comedies for me. The actors do a marvelous job acting like harry and Lloyd. The 2 actors do such a great job acting like jim carrey(Lloyd) and jeff daniels (Harry) and impersonating lloyd n harry from the 1st dumb and dumber. I think it's hilarious. A cult classic to me, especially if you like the dumb n dumber movieS. I encourage you to watch n choose for yourself. This movie also has a great soundtrack in my mind. Great film all around!! You gotaa remember that is harry and lloyd. Their character's are kind dumb lol.... Actors act/ portray themselves just like jeff daniels and jim carrey. Priceless classic!!

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: I went to see a sneak preview of this movie just yesterday, and the audience, including myself loved it. Yes, it sounds like I'm on crack but I really liked this one just as much as the first. Maybe it was Bob Saget from Full House cussing up a storm, but I thought this movie was great. I also liked the way that the actors they got to play Harry and Lloyd looked like the original actors. I won't spoil the scenes for you, but I would strongly suggest that if you liked the first one, to go see this one. The preview audience I was with was basically rolling in the aisles laughing.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
To be honest, I have completely forgotten about this movie, in two ways, I forgot what it was about, and that it even exists.

Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry met Lloyd is a sad excuse to cash in on the very highly successful and well liked Dumb and Dumber.

I applaud Jeff Daniels and Jim Carrey for not appearing or even involving themselves with this movie in the slightest sense.

This is one movie I liked the first time I saw it, and then when I watched it again, it was so stupid, and I have never watched it again, in effect, I have only watched this movie exactly twice, and that is far too many. heck, even one viewing is far too many viewing.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: This film is obscene for any number of reasons, but mainly because it took two marvelous comedic creations (Harry & Lloyd) and maligned them by suggesting they are both gay and retarded. The genius of the Farrelly Brothers' characters is that, while not particularly bright (and who doesn't know people like that?), Harry & Lloyd's friendship is both touching and funny. In this prequel, it is sad and disgraceful. This is too bad since so many obvious comedic talents are wasted - Eugene Levy, Cheri Oteri, and Bob Saget particularly (although it was a treat to hear squeaky-clean Saget screaming "Sh*t!" over and over - in outtakes he tries the word "poop" instead, but it isn't nearly as funny). When Harry Met Lloyd deserved so much better than this. I've often wished the Farrellys would make a sequel to "Dumb and Dumber". How about "Dumbing Down" - with Harry & Lloyd in Washington? Or should that be called "Dumb and Dubya"?

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: An Underwhelming Sequel With One Saving Grace
review_detailed_main: This has got to be the worst sequel for a movie I've ever seen. Nobody asked for it, but we got it thanks to New Line, who used it as just a cash-in. The basic premise has Lloyd and Harry first meeting in high school in 1986 as part of a special-needs class. The only funny thing about the film is the presence of Bob Saget, who plays the stuffy, put-upon father of the love interest that Lloyd and Harry both have eyes for and his character hates any form of fecal matter. If it wasn't for Saget's appearance, this score would be limited to one star and I'm being generous.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: I cannot believe I paid what I paid to see this movie! I feel dumb and dumberer after watching it. If it wasn't for the beautiful Rachel Nichols I think I would have walked out. This girl could be good if she had someone ACTING with her in the movie... unlike Dumb and Dumberer. This movie rates up there as one of the stupidest movies I have seen in my life. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME! GO SEE SOMETHING ELSE!

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: not Dumb and Dumber but not bad
review_detailed_main:
Granted the plot was not as good as Dumb and Dumber, nor were the jokes, but it was watchable. I don't think that the younger Harry and Lloyd had quite the chemistry as the older two did, but they made it work. I must say that I was impressed with the acting jobs of Eric Christian Olsen (Lloyd) and Derek Richardson (Harry), they did a heck of a job emulating Jim Carey and Jeff Daniels.

There were flashes of comedic brilliance throughout the movie making it very reminiscent of its predecessor, but there were just too many weak points. I think the weakness came from the lack of a fixed goal for Harry and Lloyd. In Dumb and Dumber you knew that their purpose was to deliver a briefcase to a woman in Aspen Colorado, so no matter what happened throughout the movie you knew what they were trying to accomplish. In Dumb and Dumberer they don't have a similar fixed goal.

The movie was not worth my $8 but it was good enough for an average rating, nothing less.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
The best thing about this film is the title, and I'm not saying it's a good title.

As a sequel to a funny film it had a duty to be funny if only to avoid accusations of cashing in on the franchise. However, it is a hideous disappointment. It's so bad it's embarrassing. There isn't a single laugh in it. I feel sorry for the people who went to see it because they liked Dumb & Dumber - I imagine it left a bitter taste in quite a few mouths.

The makers must have known it was going to bomb so hard, which makes me wonder how it ever got released. I can only imagine that it was a cynical attempt to make some easy money.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Well, that wasn't very good now was it?
review_detailed_main:
I loved Dumb and Dumber, I own it, gave it a 10 in the imdb database and have probably watched it 15 times or more.

When I first saw the trailer for Dumb and Dumberer, I raised my hands in the air and said "YES!"

Unfortunately, after my viewing today, all I could say was "Well, that wasn't very good now was it?"

There are so many things wrong with this film, I can't even start to list them, but the one that bugged me the most was probably the way that they took many of the lines from the first movie and tried to incorporate them in the prequel. Usually this incorporation was either wrong or poorly timed. Granted the one good line from the film "Chicks are for fags" is kinda funny, they tried to use it twice, since there were so few other lines that were memorable. Maybe the next best line was Bob Sagget's tirade of "You got poo all over my car" and "You got poo all over my bathroom."

As a huge fan of the first film, I am glad I saw this film, but it was so bad that I had to come home and watch the original another time to make up for it.

I don't plan on buying this film on DVD, but I will probably watch it again when it comes on cable.

If you do need to see this film, see it at the matinee, at least save yourself a few bucks.

The best thing about it was Eric Christian Olsen. He did a very good job imitating Jim Carey, and I predict that he has a nice future ahead of him in either films or comedy skits.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: I really hate this movie for a number of reasons, which I will tell you right now. At first It is not funny at all, its humour is to stupid for even a 10 year old child. I know that the first dumb and dumber hasn't the most original nor the cleverest comedic quotes or scenes,but at list the fun is not force and when you laugh its real. Secondary the characters are not likable at all, they are horrible people who if you meet you would try your best afterwords to forget that they exist at all.Lastly the directing is ,for a lack of a better world ,awful. In conclusion here dear readers we have a prime example of a film which was made in order to steal money of the audience using a previous hit as a starting point for a possible cash cow of a franchise, likely the film-goes were smarter than that and the film failed big time.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: I thought this movie was great and Eric and Derek did great jobs playing the characters. They are both very good looking as well. I hope everyone that sees this enjoys it because its good. And if you dont like it, then you can go away and not say bad things about it. Great job to all of the people who worked on this movie. its my favorite movie at the moment. :-D

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
This movie flat out sucks. There's no other, smart guy way to put it. Its horrible. Its the worst prequel I've ever seen, the jokes are pure, raw slapstick in it's lowest possible form, and the two leads may look like Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels, but there's no way in hell they could pull it off like they did in 1994. Also, if you're going to make a prequel, set in 1986, use stuff in 1986. We see new dollar bills and the most fatal flaw is the song "Ice Ice Baby" by Vanilla Ice. The song came out in 1990 and this is set in 1986. Sense? Nada. This movie was clearly rushed, not thought over properly, and serves no purpose.

Lets begin with the cover for the DVD. If you closely at Lloyds tooth it is clear that the left corner is just drawn with Sharpie marker or some dry erase marker to look as if it was missing. Nothing says a movie is worse than when the cover doesn't even look believable. A poor entrance to a poor movie. Fits perfectly.

Before Harry and Lloyd where the best of dumb buddies, they were in high school struggling to make the grade. Now we get to the moment they first met by bumping heads. Harry was homeschooled and is now attending regular school. Upon meeting Lloyd whom gives him a half assed tour of the school, they now become the best of friends and are inseparable. After a class opens called "The Special Needs" class, Harry and Lloyd are asked to get people to attend. A good girl Jessica finds out why the lunch lady would be teaching a class and she soon discovers that the principal and the teacher for the fake Specials class are stealing money from the school and it's now up to Harry, Lloyd, and Jessica to stop them.

Since the movie is supposed to be focused on the stupid characters of Harry and Lloyd, I shouldn't say this, but need to. It gets incredibly aggravating because the stupidity of the characters makes the movie move in a slow pace and even though its a mere 86 minutes it feels way longer. Harry and Lloyd are portrayed as stupid beyond belief. There's no way anyone in the world could be this stupid and not be mentally challenged. Its an insult.

I too find it absolutely hilarious that the cameo appearance by Bob Saget is funnier than the two leads in the movie. Bob Saget's cameo is nowhere near as funny to earn this movie an extra star, but its damn sure funny to earn it probably the most memorable thing about this movie. Julia Duffy doesn't do much in the movie, but I remember her as Mrs. Hayfer in Drake & Josh. Those will be the only two people who I cite as a "decent job done" in this movie. Eugene Levy is awful in this movie and so are the actors who portray Harry and Lloyd. Luis Guzmán also does a poor job in this as well.

I thought I'd approach this film with an open mind and have a decent attitude and relate it to something me and my friend do. I like a lot of stupid movies like Bio-Dome, but this just completely blew my mind. From the DVD menu gags to the "Dont press this button" joke on there as well I knew this movie was going to be no more than two stars if they found burping and farting to be the most hilarious joke on the planet. Sure enough I was right. Worst prequel to any movie and awful movie all together.

Starring: Eric Christian Olsen, Derek Richardson, Rachel Nichols, Bob Saget, Luis Guzmán, Eugene Levy, and Mimi Rogers.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Very BAD Movie and nothing like the first one!!!
review_detailed_main: This movie is so bad that the only thing good about it is that you can use it as a Frisbee! NOTHING like the first one, the actors are TERRIBLE (and resemble something totally different from the first) and everything about the movie was bad. Who made this movie 10 year olds? The plot is all over the place once Harry and Lloyd are doing something one minute and another minute they are doing something totally different. And when I was watching the movie I did not conceive what the conflict was about throughout the whole film! This whole movie was a total waste of electricity watching it! Once you have made a very funny and original movie, don't make another one.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Wow...I Can't Believe This was Made
review_detailed_main:
This film, a prequel to the 1994 hit Dumb and Dumber is a travesty of the film world. The title, I will admit is somewhat funny, but that's about all the funny you'll get. It's a play on the 1989 film, When Harry Met Sally. The only recognizable actor in the film is Eugene Levy, none of the others are memorable.

The story is ridiculous, nothing at all like the film it's based on (which had a solid script). The writers and director of this train wreck rely on making fun of the less fortunate and mentally challenged. The only connection the Farrelly brothers have is that they created th characters of Lloyd and Harry. It's hard to believe they allowed this film to see the light of day!

Dumb and Dumberer is honestly the stupidest film of the 2000s decade. If you really want to see this, it's probably available at your local Walmart in the cheap dvd bin.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
This film had too be one of the most unnecessary, pointless(and plot less for that matter)films I have ever seen.

With the other Dumb and Dumber being so successful I thought I would go along to see what this one was like.I was so disappointed. It has no plot and basically drags on for a while.

I did not even laugh once but crindged at the cheesy jokes and cliché phrases. I could have made a better movie myself. Some parts were mildly amusing like the polar bear suit and the woman suit.

I found the end totally off the point but Eugene levy did play Pricipal Collins quite well even though at some points his acting was quite wooden.

A good enough shot but wouldn't buy it on DVD * 3 / 1 0

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
Why did they make this? Why did I attempt to watch this? Why did I expect more?

This movie was total garbage. I liked the original too.

What you get with this movie is a script that is not funny and young actors doing impressions of Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels.

I was really tested to make it threw the movie. And I failed. Just couldn't do it. I made it 45 minutes.

Lucky me for not renting this movie - my step-son did and i burrowed it. I asked my stepson before watching this one what he thought and he said it was ok but not funny. Should have gotten the clue.

After watching the first 45 minutes I said ENOUGH and decided to watch the extra features. I'd get more background on why this movie was made and get clips of the parts I didn't watch. The funniest parts were supposed to be in the beginning - of which I saw and didn't laugh. A part where both characters play tag in a 7-11 type store and those same characters drinking a slurpee and getting brain freeze. Horrible, Horrible, Horrible. What has become of todays comedy? It's all about cheap humor and is so unoriginal.

So back to the extra features, the people who made this movie in the extra features acted like they had somekind of comedic masterpiece here. They say they were looking for people who were funny and just didn't do impressions. Well all you get here is impersonations that were not funny.

I've wasted enough time here on this one. My review is to hopefully save others from watching this. Please, don't even rent this one if you know what is good for you - it's in the bottom 100 for a reason. That's it - goal achieved.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: If I've had a worse time, I don't remember when
review_detailed_main: I am a laughing kind of guy. I laugh at the dentist's office, in the ER, and sometimes I even laugh on the toilet. I went through an eternity of Harry and Lloyd; I think I may have chuckled once. This is a movie that should be lauded in some way as being the ultimate pain that $8 can buy. I loved the original Dumb & Dumber; I will even say Ace Ventura has its moments. This movie is a soulless, macabre piece of celluloid through which evil incarnates itself. Oh, and I hope everyone involved in its making suffers from horrible cases of: diarrhea, herpes, and possibly gout.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: The actors playing Harry and Lloyd gave it a good effort but the script, other acting talent and plot were diabolical. 84 minutes of my life has passed, 82 minutes of it in mispent optimism, don't repeat my mistake ... apart from Mimi Rogers' french kiss!

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
I saw Dumb and Dumberer on opening night. I entered the theater with a highly skeptical attitude toward this prequel to a classic movie that I love for its total randomness, stupid hilarity and countless other details Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels brought to the part. The movie began with some of the most terrifically horrible ads I've ever seen in my life, and I was losing hope for this movie rapidly if this was how they were going to front the audience before playing it. And then it began...and I was extremely impressed! The actors sincerely looked and acted like teenage versions of they're predecessors, and as such a great on screen team the laughs never subsided when Lloyd and Harry were in the scene.

I found only a few faults that would irritate the average movie-goer and criticizer of this movie, as they bugged me ever since I left the theater. One is that Lloyd, Jim Carrey's old part, is very controlling of Harry and is a 'jerk' the majority of the way through the movie, which really got on my nerves. In addition, Harry seemed too laid back and just let Lloyd treat him somewhat negatively. Also, there was almost no plot line! In the first 1994 movie there was an ultimate goal, a reason for the movie. In this prequel, there was one but it seemed as though New Line Cinema Stuck it in there just for spite. Thirdly, they didn't film it in the same way as the first! In Dumb and Dumber, every place the characters went, several funny things happened there that the viewer remembered later as the 'Cafe scene' or the 'beer scene'...In Dumb and DumberER, each clipping was significantly shorter, leaving the audience to figure out later what happened or why something occured, which is, in truth, an insanely poor movie-making technique that irritates.

Besides those problems, however, and despite this movie being very different than its well-loved predecessor,it's hilarious! Many parts I found myself not able to breathe from laughing so hard, and maybe you need to be a teenager as I am to fully comprehend the jokes, but it was hilarious in its own way. This is a movie you'll want to take your crew of friends to and laugh at all the sickening stupidity and overall dumbererness of the first adventures, when Harry met Lloyd. I was impressed as it excelled past the standards I set for this flick, and maybe you will think so as well. Give it a try and go see it! An 8 out of 10 stars. Fantastically humorous and, well..dumb!

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
If you keep your expectations in check this is a decent prequel. No, it doesn't have Jim Carrey or Jeff Daniels, but Derek Richardson and Eric Christian Olsen do a good of portraying Lloyd and Harry during their high school years.

A crooked high principal (Eugene Levy) and the lunch lady (Cheri Oteri) have a plan to bilk the school out of a large some of money. In order to pull the scam off they need to put together a special needs class. They enlist Harry and Lloyd to pick the other students for the special class. Another student Jessica, who writes for the school newspaper is suspicious of this new special needs class and aims to get to the bottom of what exactly is going on with the help of Lloyd and Harry.

I think people dog on this movie because of how popular the original Dumb and Dumber is. This isn't in the same league, but all things considered it's a fairly decent film with some good laughs. There's a couple of humorous scenes with Bob Saget. I recommend this over Dumb and Dumber To.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Why this movie does not work.
review_detailed_main:
It is very strange that when I read the user reviews of this site, so few actually talk about why the movie is so bad. Well, I'd like to take a moment to say why I didn't, and in better detail than most, hopefully, enjoy the movie.

Dumb and Dumberer is a prequel, which if the word "sequel" is of any indication, means it is a continuation from the first. Well, "Prequel" implies it as a "beginning of" story, sort of what happened in the childhoods of Harry and Lloyd, who were originally played by Jeff Daniels and Jim Carrey, respectively.

The characters in the story are Harry and Lloyd, two simple minded teenagers, who lack any real charm or clever idiocy that was played so well in the original. The idea in this movie is that the principal, played by the legendary Eugene Levy (Jim's Dad in American Pie and most of its sequels) is trying to find a get rich quick scheme, so he develops a special needs class to make the money, but he needs students.

If that part of the plot doesn't offend you, don't worry, the rest will.

Harry and Lloyd go on a search to find kids who are just like them, (although its so insulting to think special needs kids can't tell an Asian girl from a mentally handicapped child) and needless to say, a class is formed.

Jessica, a very smart teenage girl (which only implies the entire school isn't smart enough to recognize this plot) sees the ruse, and uses our heroes to dig up the dirt on the principal.

To be honest, if the movie didn't have the "Dumb and Dumber" moniker or even a mentioning of Harry and Lloyd, this movie probably would have faded into obscurity, nary, even been made, and if it did, it might have been a cult classic if it had been better written and not as relying on the first movie's jokes.

The movie has some references to the original picture, but the problem is that references aren't usually funny. So when this movie references the laxative from the original as a large truck carrying said product, it doesn't make it funny, you are just implying that you watched the movie enough to notice it.

The problem with this movie is just lazy writing. The creators probably thought watching enough of the original was a good idea to create a sequel, but what it does is insult anyone who tries really hard to write good comedy with insulting retreads from classic movies.

Harry and Lloyd aren't some kind of smart, they are all kinds of moron. In the original, it is implied they aren't smart, but in reality, it's that their ideas of intelligence is slightly askew from most people, but it was mostly honest mistakes. Lloyd hearing the country Austria and playing it off as Australia is believable, and more than likely a mistake a person has made before, as opposed to say, talking about who Benjamin Franklin is (Where Lloyd explains that Ben Franklin was the "Pilgrim who invented Penicillin and defeated Godzilla").

Critics and most writers will tell you that was is usually funny isn't funny, it's what you play off as serious that's funny. The characters aren't serious people doing funny things, they are played off as funny people doing funny things, and that doesn't always equal funny.

The actors seem rather detached from the project, as if they all simultaneously had a large bill to pay, so they played their appropriate roles just to pay it off to do better movies. It was strange that from the years 2003 and 2005, people thought that making sequels to previous Jim Carrey movies was to be cinematic gold, was actually just copper painted up and advertised as gold.

It is always going to be argued that sequels are never better than their original counterparts, and that's understandable, only so many movies have that bragging right. That doesn't mean if you have an idea for a sequel and you feel strongly in making a sequel that you have to do it poorly in every means possible: in writing, in acting, in character development, music, staffing, ETC. It should be room to improve. A sequel, in particular, a prequel should challenge the audience to see how the characters became who they are when we remember them, not putting them in a less than original story.

This concludes my review, I give it a 2/10.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Far and Away the Worst Movie I've Seen

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: There is a difference between dumb and very stupid.
review_detailed_main:
Bad, and tasteless comedy that makes Jim Carry look like a comic genius in comparison, and makes the Farrelly. brothers look like prestige directors of tast. Every thing that can go wrong with this film goes wrong, and it's not even funny.

Keep a way and rent the original.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Utter bilge but better than the first
review_detailed_main: From the trailers, it would appear as though this movie was better than the first. It was but it was also a complete pile of crap as expected from such an undertaking. With terrible acting, no story, horrible jokes, toilet humor and utterly disgusting events, this movie is something that should have priority on everyone's avoid list. The two guys playing with each other like children is not funny nor cute nor dumb. They look more like gay lovers by the way it is crudely portrayed in this movie. This movie should be in the bottom 100 and I don't know why its not? Easily one of the worst movies ever made. Don't fall for the commercials and torture yourself by seeing this movie. Avoid at all costs.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: This movie was a sacrilegious follow up to the original. It should have never been created without the original cast. The lines are terrible and who ever wrote the movie tried to take all of the one liners in the first one and put them in the second on. Dont bother wasting your time or money on this piece of trash.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: This movie was SO BAD, I wanted to buy all the copies to BURN THEM!
review_detailed_main: In short? This movie is absolutely terrible. The plot line is terrible, the actors are terrible. When I watched it, I thought to myself "Why in the heck did I pay $6.00 to see this? As mentioned in my title, this movie is SO BAD, that I would love to buy every copy in existence just to burn them. I think one of the parts of the movie I hated the most was when they called the Asian girl "Ching Chong". Really? I know Asian people that saw the movie, and were highly offended at the fact that they would even fathom calling an Asian person "Ching Chong". However, there was one good part in the movie (The only good part)... Bob Saget and the "There's SH** EVERYWHERE! Ordeal. Best part of the whole movie. For those that want to see it, don't bother... it's not even worth it if it's in the $1 bin at Dollar Tree.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Not a very good movie, at all!
review_detailed_main: I didn't have high hopes for this movie and i was right about that. I absolutely love dumb & dumber so i was really dissapointed when i saw this. It is like they are not even trying to make a good movie. Just put in two new actors and make them try to act like Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels. And allthough Eric Christian Olsen sounds like Jim Carrey's Lloyd Christmas sometimes, it is not enough to save the movie.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Not as bad as it seems
review_detailed_main: I know that the movie is not the best of well, anything, but if you go into it knowing that, you may enjoy it. It's beyond ridiculous and they tried waaay to hard to make it the cringiest experience you've ever had, but in all honesty I loved it. It probably helps that I saw the original dumb and dumber when it was in theaters at least 7 times since it was my favorite movie hands down back then (I think I was 11 or 12) and in my eyes at the time Jim Carey could do no wrong. While the reviews really aren't too positive about it, I really do recommend watching it at least once to make up your own mind.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: What Is This?... Not Worth Seeing

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd (2003, Dir. Troy Miller)

It's the 80's, and it's the moment that Lloyd Christmas and Harry Dunne meet. The two individuals are seen by many as 'special', and become best friends as soon as they meet. Principal Collins and his lover, the lunch lady, Ms. Heller want to make as much money out of scams, and their next idea is to create a special needs class. Ms. Heller is the teacher, and they have assigned Harry and Lloyd to round the special students up. School News Reporter Jessica is suspicious though, and desperately tries to find out the truth, even if it means gaining Harry and Lloyd's help.

OK, where do i start? If you was a huge fan of 'Dumb and Dumber' then i advise you to stay clear from this. If you liked the original, and is just interested in what the prequel contains, then don't go into this viewing with high hopes. To sum up this film is one word, i would use 'bad'. Just plain bad. The main problem with this film is the jokes. There is a story but only a very basic story, and the jokes are focused on innuendos, which sounds as if they were written by 12 year old's. Although some of us might have been 12 when the original film came out, we would definitely not be 12 now. Innuendos jokes just does not make a film good, especially when the innuendos jokes aren't even that good. The acting is OK. There impersonations of Harry and Lloyd are not exactly perfect, but they do a good job. The rest of the cast are OK. Seeing Eugene Levy and Cheri Oteri in a scene together, did actually make me chuckle a little, but Eugene Levy should have known better to pick a role like this. There are the few other good appearances from stars such as Shia LaBeouf, Mimi Rogers and Lin Shaye. Still, if i was you, i would only watch it for the performance of a specific actor.

"Come on out, you little b******." - Doctor (Timothy Stack)

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: what on earth were the people thinking when they made this one? the movie had few (and when i say few i mean like one or two, nothing higher than a 3) funny moments that only lasted a minute to me and that was all. i had a whole movie store and i pick one of the dumbest movies ever. they should have made one with jim carrey and jeff daniels and saw what happened after the 1st one, not go back and mess it up! I can picture the title Dumb and Stoopid and having lloyd and harry meet someone not as dumb but not like a genius and have them get married or something. i would have rather seen that then dumb and dumberer. but i give the guys that played them from back in the day credit for at least looking like lloyd and harry. (D D-)

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: A major let down - awful script and thoughtless directing
review_detailed_main:
I was a big fan of the original. I think I laughed more at it's mindless humour than I did at any other movie I can recall. Admittedly, I was 12 at the time, but have seen it more recently in my adult years and was still highly entertained.

So I was looking forward to this. The trailer promised more of the mindless action provided by the first film and the characters Harry and Lloyd looked well cast.

That was where the positives ended really. As well cast as Harry and Lloyd were - Eric Christian Olsen was excellent and true to Jim Carrey's original portrayl of Lloyd - there is nothing they could do to rescue a diabolical script and storyline.

Part of the humour of the first was that only Harry and Lloyd were that ridiculously idiotic. They were misunderstood by a believable world. This was part of the strength of the first, which allowed for an excellent story line and some near-water inducing situations. But such clever circumstances are left well behind in this prequel.

Everybody is an idiot in this movie and that immediately impacts on the humour potential. If anything, the poor and corny quips from the supporting cast detract from the movie. Ms. Heller (Cheri Oteri) comes across as even more stupid than the two main characters. Such ridiculous but plot-centric concepts as Principal Collins (Eugene Levy) keeping all the evidence of his crimes, needed to bury him in jail for life, baffle the mind for their awful stupidity. Even the funnier moments wear out quickly - somebody can only think chocolate is poo for so long.

Perhaps I'm doing this movie a disservice, but I'm not. There are a few laughs, however they are few and far between. The plot is substandard. There are none of the classic settings, for Lloyd and Harry to create carnage in, that were in abundance in the first movie. The directing is poor and misses many things (like the 90s cars and songs in a movie set in 1986).

This calamity of a prequel is no fault of the actors. Most of the major characters do as well as could be expected with what is just a lame script. Even the end of movie 'girls in need' part is pathetic.

This movie was abysmal. The only reason it gets above a 0 is because Harry and Lloyd were well portrayed and managed to provide an occasional laugh despite the script/director's best attempts. You'd have to be seriously devoid of comedy in your life to find this movie funny.

It just doesn't belong in the same video store as the original. 1/5.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: After the huge success of "Dumb & Dumber" (which i liked very much!!)with Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels.. somebody wanted to ride the "wave of money" again and made "Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd"..oh what a mistake!!! This movie is not even near to the hilarious original one. The new actors of the movie are a lame copy of the previous ones, the plot is stupid and most of all not funny at all!!! Why the hell did this movie came out at the first place!!! And why i lost a very important hour and a half of my life on this moronic movie!!!

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: This movie was not really that good. First, it lacked Jim Carey, and b/c of this I don't think that the comedy was as funny. The movie actually discourages me to go see another D&D movie if it was created. For, the most part the movie included more stupidity than comedy.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
Being a huge Dumb and Dumber fan, I checked this movie out anticipating mediocraty. It met my expectations alright. The movie is not the same without Carrey, Daniels and Farrelley Bros. D'uh, we knew that. But what makes the movie even worse is the writing. It was one of the most poorly written, thrown together for profit piece of trash ever. The jokes were recycled, the acting left much desired for(with the exception of Richardson), and even Eugene Levy's part wasn't funny. Levy is a great actor who can be very funny and this movie didn't utilize his talent at all. They made the characters appear to be retarded instead of just dumb (what's so funny about that!?), they made Lloyd come off gay which he wasn't in the original. Lloyd's dad was ridiculous and not in the good way.

To make up for jokes, talent and creativity, they inserted music montages throughout using footage you JUST saw 5-10 min earlier. This movie has nothing to do with Dumb and Dumber. It's completely terrible and not worth seeing. I'm angry that they tried to franchise the coolest movie ever into this rubbish. Thumbs down.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: This was, as far as I can remember, the least funny movie I have ever seen. Although I avoid the movies that I know will be lousy, like "Kangaroo Jack" and junk like "From Justin to Kelly", I really blew it with this one. The first movie had the strength of the comedic legend Jim Carrey, whereas this one has only two established actors, and they are playing the 'villians'. There was basically no story, and the only part that I laughed at was a scene where Bob Saget makes a cameo. Most of the movie even followed the structure of the first, including the ending! This certainly ranks as the most unnecessary prequel ever made. Now I know why Jeff Daniels and Jim Carrey stayed away from this project. A definite candidate for the worst movie of the year.

review_detailed_main: Do I have to be DUMB to enjoy this movie? I am very upset and it was a waist of my sixteen dollars. I really think that the movie was a rip off only to make money. It is said I am struct by that show It wasnt funny it was stupid

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main: Oh man I have never laughed so hard in my life! That movie was the GREATEST! I couldn't stop kicking the chair in front of me, thank god there was no one in it! I began to tear! Both actors chosen for Harry and Lloyd did fantastic jobs and I don't think any other cast could've been better!

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: If you loved the original, you'll hate this; if you didn't like the original, this will seem kinda cute
review_detailed_main: The starring actors, who had some big shoes to fill, were excellent as both their characters and portraying the original actors. There were some genuinely funny lines. The plot needed strengthening and there were some extremely tiresome bits, but this movie is not at all as bad or as worthy of hatred as some of the comments and reviews would lead one to believe. It isn't a Farrelly Brothers comedy, it isn't a Jim Carrey comedy. As a light-hearted teen stoner comedy, it's cute. But if you're expecting the unique type of humor the Farrellys and Carrey are famous for, you'll be disappointed simply because this just isn't them. If it stood alone as summer fluff, there would have been a lot of fans who genuinely enjoyed it. Leave your preconceptions behind. Go into it with an open mind and without expecting a cinematic masterpiece, and you'll get some laughs.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
The prequel to the 1994 comedy hit Dumb & Dumber is set in 1986 when Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas (Derek Richardson and Eric Christian Olsen) were in high school. Due to their tremendously stupid behaviour they are put in a special education class that the school's principal Collins (Eugene Levy) has created in order to embezzle the money meant for advancing the special students' rights. The shady actions of the principal are being investigated by a smart but good-looking student named Jessica (Rachel Nichols), who also evokes feelings in both Harry and Lloyd.

As Dumb and Dumberer is a prequel, it's only natural that neither Jim Carrey nor Jeff Daniels of the original movie reprises their roles. Instead, Richardson and Olsen try to emulate the original actors' styles, but since they haven't got the natural aura of comedy like Carrey and Daniels do, the result is just painfully unfunny. Both protagonists, especially Harry, are essentially retards whose constant yelling and bantering is nothing but irritating. Olsen's attempts of capturing Carrey's trademark facial expressions are probably the best thing about the performances, but that is a very, very faint praise. One can only wonder how a talented supporting actor like Luis Guzmán ended up in a movie like this.

As opposed to the road trip theme of Dumb & Dumber, the jokes in the prequel are largely based on tired high school stereotypes, so it must have been difficult to come up with anything we haven't already seen many times, if the writers ever even tried to achieve anything that ambitious. Plenty of sex jokes and toilet humour are also present, and while one gross-out scene actually is funny, the premise of the joke is essentially recycled from the first movie, raising even more questions about the point of this movie's existence. In addition, the film comes across as mocking and mean-spirited towards real-life special education students. As not even the blooper reel over the end credits is funny, Dumb and Dumberer seriously cannot be recommended to anyone but the most undemanding of comedy fans, if even them. The rest of us should just avoid it altogether.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Full and empty at the same time: Empty of humour and plot yet full of offence (amongst other things).
review_detailed_main:
Going into this film, I thought it would be a little risky to make a prequel to a film entitled Dumb and Dumber; especially with the gap between films a whole nine years. The reason I thought it'd be risky is because the recent spate of sequels, prequels, remakes and so forth hasn't exactly been a success story so another helping to two misfits in their younger years in a film entitled Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd could've been a disaster.

It's probably been said before but few films actually come close to having their titles describe them - Dumb and Dumberer does this. Some other films that have done so could include Scary Movie (although that wasn't too scary) and Epic Movie (although by sounds of things, that wasn't too epic). One thing all these films have in common in the long run is that they're all failed comedies. Dumb and Dumberer isn't just a failed comedy; it's an insult to a number of things, one of which is us, the viewers. The reoccurring joke in Dumb and Dumberer is that of the mocking of people with disabilities or special needs. People who find it difficult to learn at the same speed or are 'below' the average when it comes to day to day skills are the overall butt of jokes in Dumb and Dumberer and it's difficult to watch at times. This is probably Dumb and Dumberer's biggest error.

It's not just people with disabilities that are targeted but they do get a pretty rough time. One person thinks Marco Polo invented the swimming pool; he also thinks George Washington invented money since the guy's face is all over it. But no: the crippled, the foreign and women in general are targeted in such a way; even mildly smirking at it could be considered a crime. A Chinese girl doesn't speak much English: she's special; a guy with a broken arm is useless: he's special and the way the women (the mother character, the female student Jessica and Principal Collins' (Levy) scenes with Ms. Heller (Oteri)) are treated is extremely disrespectful and sexist. Jessica (Nichols) is put across as a prize to be won but it later turns out she has a boyfriend and merely runs off to him whenever the situation calls for it, Ching Chong (Krusiec) despite having a ridiculous name eventually tells everyone she can speak English (why she kept it a secret, I don't know) but goes right back to submissive, dumb Chinese girl who "don't speekee Inglish" on a male's demand.

The film also lacks any sort of a story and thus; doesn't have that much conflict, it's just making fun of these different groups. Whatever conflict there is, is so watered down and weak, it's incredible. The Principal and a teacher want to stiff the school and its special needs department just so they can run off together to Hawaii; that's it. They conduct this evil scheme that just isn't really that evil; we realise they're not likable people but because you have no caring towards the people they're trying to stiff you don't really care. Although one or two situations arise that are funny such as the melted chocolate scene and the window exchange scene where Lloyd transports a convocation to Jessica through Harry who's actually talking to a stray dog, the bulk of the humour is either unfunny slapstick or of the racist/sexist/disabilities mocking variety.

I wasn't really engaged by the film in fact I felt sorry for Harry and Lloyd more than anything and wanted them to succeed through pity than anything else. I really liked the way Derek Richardson and Eric Christian Olsen were made to look like Carrey and Daniels from the first film  that was impressive but this is real borderline trash with no laughs and pretty damned offensive material which will only encourage children to act against foreign people, girls and people with disabilities in a negative way should they see it.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: This Movie Insults the Intelligence of 1st Graders
review_detailed_main: This movie was a complete pile of soggy sh*t! After sitting through the first 15 minutes of it I felt like I was back in the 1st grade when fart jokes and toilet humor ruled the day, but sadly this movie didn't even live up to the standards that I held when I was 6 years old. When I left the theater, there was a unanimous vibe coming from the audience that screamed "I can't believe I just wasted 90 f***ing minutes and $8.75 on such a loathsome trash heap of a movie!!!!!!!!" There is absolutely nothing worthy of praise here. I give it a 0/10, which means to avoid it even if a raving lunatic holds a gun to your head and proclaims that the only way to live is to watch this movie.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
Sequels is something that plagues the movie industry, today more than ever. Every successful movie must have a sequel it seems, and sometimes even not-so-successful movies get their share. Next to remakes, lame sequels is one of the worst things i know.

Right from the start it's obvious that this movie has absolutely nothing to offer in way of comedy. I read in the trivia that most of the cast were chosen on the grounds that they were "huge Dumb & Dumber fans". I'm not surprised. This movie is simply put what you get if you lock a bunch of talentless retards in a room and loop Dumb & Dumber. We have a duo of "actors" (and i use the term loosely here) acting the parts Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels had in the original. And watching them act is like seeing 10-year old kids in front of a mirror making faces and trying desperately to sound like their idols. Sure i have a laugh with my friends quoting movies, sure i sometimes say "Like a glove!" to myself when i park the car trying to sound like Jim Carrey... Most people do stuff like this. Most people however don't record it on film and try to sell it as a sequel to their favorite movies! Of course the biggest flaw is still not the crappy actors or the complete lack of comedy in both script and acting. Rather it's the complete lack of understanding for what made the first movie such a success. I know a lot of people who loathe silly comedy who still like "Dumb & Dumber". Why? Because the Farrelly brothers have an uncanny sense when it comes to making their oddball characters lovable in a strange way. There is a warmth in the portrayal even when they are at their most pathetic (or even twisted). Of course that is completely missing here, just like everything else that makes a movie good...

Even though expectations were abysmally low this movie still managed to put them to shame. I rate this 1/10 since that is the lowest grade it's possible to give.

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
Rhose Island, 1969. Harry Dunne (Derek Richardson)was born. It was so funny when he was about to be born, he bit the doctor. And the doctor said that Harry was a baby who liked to play hide and seek and he was a shy one! Eight years later, Harry had an imaginary friend named Captain Rob and the cops always had to save Rob from from the well in Harry's backyard! Ha! Ha! Ha! And ten years later, Harry's mother (Mimi Rogers) sent Harry and Rob on a treasure hunt. And that was, finding the school! Ha!Ha! Lloyd Christmas (Eric Christian Olsen), on the other hand was an adopted child and his father was a janitor of a school. And they together lived in the school.

Lloyed and Harry eventually bumped into each other and Lloyd chipped his tooth when they both went around a corner. Harry was running away from a Rot Veiler and Lloyd, however, was looking for the when in fact, he was living in the school! Lloyd had a bully named Turk (Elden Henson) was sure was a real thug! And Lloyd also met a girl named Jessica Mathika (Rachel Nichols). Lloyd and Harry , however, attended special classes which were in the school's cafeteria and was run by the Lunch Lady, Ms.Heller (Cheri Oteri). And Lloyd and Harry had to find students who were "special" like them.

Lloyd first got a boy with casts named Toby (Josh Braaten), Turk, Carl (William Lee Scott), who injured himself in a Football match, an exchange student named Ching Chong (Michelle Krusiec) and a half horse, half human boy named Lewis (Shia LaBoeuf). They were the "Special Needs Class Of 1986".

They had a kiff bus. It was so hilarious when Jessica was chasing "The Special Needs Bus" because, she thought it special. And then, the bus went flying into the air in slow motion and inside, everyone was screaming in a decreased tone. And then , when Jessica went flying into the air, she landed with a thud! Ha!Ha!Ha! It was funny when Harry was spending time with Jessica at her house, Harry thought Jessica was making him hot when in fact , it was the heater which he was sitting on which it making him hot! And then, he went to the bathroom and when he removed his hand from his back pocket, and he sniffed his hand due to it being covered in a brown substance. It was chocolate! Mmm! That is something lovely to snack on when you needed to. And when he removed the rest of the chocolate from his back pocket, he threw it up into the air and, it went everywhere! And he wasn't able to clean it up! Lol.

I was so charmed when Lloyd was talking to a dog when he was outside Jessica's home. And Harry repeated after him: "Oh, I remember you. How could I forget those hairy nipples?!" And then Jessica's father, Mr.Walter (Bob Saget) entered the room, he asked Jessica why Harry was talking to Jessica like that. And Jessica said, "It's because he's special". Lol! And then! Mr.Walter entered the bathroom and yelled how harry didn't know how to use a toilet when it just chocolate everywhere.Ha!Ha!Ha!

It was hysterical to see Jessica take on Harry's mother. It was one of Lloyed's dreams about Harry's mom. And who would fall in love with Lloyd. And suddenly, Harry appeared and Harry was shocked to see it!! Lol! Another amusing moment was when Harry thought he found the treasure which he had been looking for all this time when in fact, it was a chest which belonged to Mr.Collins (Eugene Levy), the Headmaster of the school. Collins' chest had the scams. And soon, all the kids of "The Special Class" realized this was all a scam! So, to get Collins back, the gang created a huge version of Collins in pirate style and it spoke in Collins voice about his "Grand Master Plan". And it sure was the crime of the century! He was trying to make a run off with all the extra money he and Ms.Heller made with that "Special Class". The kids weren't even getting an education!

Now, to end this review. I didn't mention all the other laughs in the movie because, they were all clichés and I am sure you would recognize where they got the ending for the movie. But anyways, the film still was fun with style. And you could see that they were even worse when they were kids! Ha!Ha!Ha!

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_title: Not a great movie, but good for a laugh or two
review_detailed_main:
When i first heard that there was going to be another "Dumb and Dumber" movie, i was really excited, but then i heard that Jim Carrey and Jeff Danials would not be returning, so i figured, this ones gonna suck. So sitting down to watch it i was expecting the worse, but i was delightfully surprised when i found out this movie is actually good. Pretty much all the jokes are funny and there really isn't any sort of lull in the film, like the first one had. The story is simple and the characters are great. All the performances are really great, especially Eric Christian Olsen and Derek Richardson both a very good and pull off a young Harry and Lloyd very well, i found Richardson to get annoying after a while, but Olsen was dead on the entire movie, he is exactly how Jim Carrey used to be (before he left wacky comedies to do more dramas)This kid could be Carrey's son, and could probably pull off young versions of Ace Ventura and The Mask. I predict you'll be seeing more of Mr. Olsen in the future. The other actors in the film were also very good, but the one that stood out most was Eugine Levy, Man, is this guy hillarious or what, just seeing him makes me want to laugh, and he's particularly effective as the principal in the film.

So basically this isn't the greatest film ever made, but its also not the worst. It does what it sets out to do, which is to provide a few laughs for an hour and a half. If you loved the first then you should for sure check this one out

7/10 stars

movie_name: Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
review_detailed_main:
I rarely swear in a movie review. If I dislike a certain feature, I always try to describe it as 'disappointing' or 'only mildly enjoyable'. Unfortunately, there's only one word in the English language that could possibly sum up DUMB AND DUMBERER - and it rhymes with kite.

Plotwise, and that's a laughable word to use here, D&D tells the story of how dumbass friends Harry and Lloyd came to meet at high school. Forget the original's gutsy charm; this is a teen gross-out movie along the lines of "American Pie" - but as the two main protaganists have the mental age of a five year old (between them) - their goals aren't to lose their virginity or anything adult like that, simply to recruit people to be in their special needs class.

Sound fun? I especially like the way that director Troy Miller decided to make Harry and Lloyd unlikeable dur-durs, thereby removing the only possible remaining interest for the audience. In the original, Harry and Lloyd were funny - braindead, for sure, but funny. You wanted to see them succeed in their wholly unattainable goals; here, you're waiting for something bad to happen just to get them off the screen for a few precious minutes.

The only positive thing about this movie - and it's a very small positive, nowhere near enough to actually go see it - is Eugene Levy as the school's scheming headmaster. Eugene is one of the funniest actors in America at the moment and it's sad to see him in drivel like this. Were it not for his presence, I'd definitely have walked out the cinema mid-movie.

Avoid this, it's the worst movie of the year. * / *****

You kinda guessed who will be the stars of this special class...

There's a 'romantic' lovestory as well but it's dumb and stupid more than anything else. Not that I haven't laughed at this movie, or would put it in my bottom 100. But that's about it.

4/10.
